languages.text: "Пусть ты не помнишь настоящей семьи, но неужели так легко принимаешь смерть собратьев?"
"You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
languages.original_text: "Пусть ты не помнишь настоящей семьи, но неужели так легко принимаешь смерть собратьев?"

traits.locale_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned about the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
"You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned about the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
"You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
"You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
"You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
"You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"

languages.text: «Puede que no recuerde a su auténtica familia, pero ¿de verdad le importa tan poco la muerte de sus compañeros del culto?».
languages.original_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"

traits.locale_text: «Puede que no recuerde a su auténtica familia, pero ¿de verdad le importa tan poco la muerte de sus compañeros del culto?».

languages.text: 「本当の家族のことを覚えてないかもしれないが、仲間の教団員の死が本当に気にならないのか？」
languages.original_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"

traits.locale_text: 「本当の家族のことを覚えてないかもしれないが、仲間の教団員の死が本当に気にならないのか？」

languages.text: “或许你已经忘记了真正的家人，但当你的教派同伴死亡的时候，你也真的那么无动于衷吗？”
languages.original_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"

traits.locale_text: “或许你已经忘记了真正的家人，但当你的教派同伴死亡的时候，你也真的那么无动于衷吗？”

languages.text: "Ihr mögt Euch nicht an Eure richtige Familie erinnern, aber berührt Euch der Tod anderer Kultisten wirklich so wenig?"
languages.original_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mögt Euch nicht an Eure richtige Familie erinnern, aber berührt Euch der Tod anderer Kultisten wirklich so wenig?"

languages.text: « Vous ne vous souvenez peut-être pas de votre vraie famille, mais êtes-vous vraiment aussi insensible à la mort de vos condisciples ? »
languages.original_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne vous souvenez peut-être pas de votre vraie famille, mais êtes-vous vraiment aussi insensible à la mort de vos condisciples ? »

languages.text: "Gerçek aileni hatırlamıyor olabilirsin. Peki tarikattaki kardeşlerin ölünce de bu kadar vurdumduymaz mı oluyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You may not remember your real family, but are you truly so unconcerned by the deaths of your fellow cultists?"
